Product Description

Out of Sight Power

High performance

The OptiPlex 790, now delivers leading-edge technology and versatility to any business environment with the space-saving Micro chassis.

Powerful, bulk storage.

Available with Intel Core CPU, Intel HD graphics, and Intel vPro systems management, OptiPlex 790 enables increased power and productivity.Enjoy your bulk storage device!

Specifications Processor: Intel Core 2nd Gen 3.3GHz Storage: 500GB HDD Optical: DVDRW Port: USB 2.0, DisplayPort, VGA, RJ-45.

Easy integration

Help get the most out of existing IT investments with legacy feature support available on the The OptiPlex 790 like DP port, a VGA port, and an RJ-45 connection.Support Dual display.

Powerful processing and drive options

Select from powerful 4th Gen Intel Core 2nd Gen 3.3 GHz and integrated Intel HD UMA graphics along with other configurable options that let businesses configure the right OptiPlex 790 for each user’s needs.

Rebust storage and memory

The combination of key integrated components allows this computer to excel at work, home or school. DDR3 RAM allows for efficient multi-tasking, and abundant hard drive space provides ample room to store files, apps, music and movies.

Executive-class collaboration

A brand new installation of the Microsoft Windows 10 Pro 64 Language Supports English/Spanish/French Operating System, free of bloatware commonly installed from other manufacturers. As Microsoft’s stablest OS to date, Windows 10 Pro will maximize the utility of your PC for years to come.

Upgrade Bay

The OptiPlex 790 comes with DVDRW drive supports reading and writing DVD data.

Gigabit Ethernet & USB Wi-Fi adapter

The OptiPlex 790 connects to the Internet using a high speed Gigabit Ethernet adapter or stable performance Wi-Fi.

Dell 790 Intel I3 Dual-Core 3.3 GHz Processor
What’s Inside: 4GB RAM, 500GB Hard Drive, DVW Optical Drive,

This pre-owned or refurbished product has been professionally inspected and tested to work and look like new. How a product becomes part of Amazon Renewed, your destination for pre-owned, refurbished products: A customer buys a new product and returns it or trades it in for a newer or different model. That product is inspected and tested to work and look like new by Amazon-qualified suppliers. Then, the product is sold as an Amazon Renewed product on Amazon. If not satisfied with the purchase, renewed products are eligible for replacement or refund under the Amazon Renewed Guarantee.

Warranty & Support

Amazon.com Return Policy:You may return any new computer purchased from Amazon.com that is “dead on arrival,” arrives in damaged condition, or is still in unopened boxes, for a full refund within 30 days of purchase. Amazon.com reserves the right to test “dead on arrival” returns and impose a customer fee equal to 15 percent of the product sales price if the customer misrepresents the condition of the product. Any returned computer that is damaged through customer misuse, is missing parts, or is in unsellable condition due to customer tampering will result in the customer being charged a higher restocking fee based on the condition of the product. Amazon.com will not accept returns of any desktop or notebook computer more than 30 days after you receive the shipment. New, used, and refurbished products purchased from Marketplace vendors are subject to the returns policy of the individual vendor.

Product Warranty: For warranty information about this product, please click here

Price: $859.95 - $799.95
(as of Nov 30,2022 01:54:54 UTC – Details)

Product Description

Oemgenuine sells some computers with upgraded configurations. If the computer has modifications (listed above), then the manufacturer box is opened for installation and testing purposes. If no modifications are listed, the item is unopened and untested.

Operating System: Genuine Microsoft Windows 10 Pro 64 Bit *Windows 11 Ready* (Windows 10 Pro preloaded, will be able to upgrade to Windows 11 Pro)

Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 Pro 5650G [6 Cores] (3.9GHz – 4.4GHz, 3MB L2 / 16MB L3)

RAM: 32GB DDR4 3200MHz

Graphics: Integrated AMD Radeon Graphics

Storage: 1TB Solid State Drive NVMe 4.0

Form Factor: Small Form Factor (SFF)

Optical Drive: DVD±RW

Wireless: Wi-Fi N150 802.11b/g/n + Bluetooth 4.0

Keyboard: Lenovo Traditional Keyboard (USB connector), English, black

Mouse: Lenovo Calliope Mouse (USB connector), black

Front Ports: 2x USB 3.2 Gen 1, 2x USB 3.2 Gen 2, 1x USB-C 3.2 Gen 1, 1x headphone / microphone combo jack (3.5mm), 1x microphone (3.5mm)

Rear Port: 4x USB 2.0, 1x HDMI, 2x DisplayPort, 1x serial (9-pin), 1x Ethernet (RJ-45), 1x line-out (3.5mm)

Audio: High Definition (HD) Audio, Realtek ALC623-CG codec, internal speaker 1Wx1

Power Supply: 260W 85%

Weight: 11.7 LBS

Power to work

The ThinkCentre M75s Gen 2 desktop will breeze through your toughest. Multitask, create content, and crunch data easily, improving productivity and the bottom line.

Steadfast security

The Thinkcentre M75s Gen 2 small form factor desktop’s discrete Trusted Platform Module (dTPM) chip encrypts critical information and enables hardware authentication. BIOS-based Smart USB Protection prevents unauthorized access via peripheral. And AMD GuardMI technology enables power-on-to-power-off data protection with a co-processor inside the AMD Ryzen PRO CPU.

Convenience guaranteed

Turn on the desktop with a simple key stroke. Connect multiple peripherals to a variety of ports, for seamless multitasking. Easily manage updates, diagnostics, and security from a remote location.

Energy-efficient and reliable

The M75s Gen 2 has a minimal footprint on the environment as well as on your desk. It meets global sustainability standards. It’s designed and rigorously tested for durability and reliability.

Windows 10 Pro Preloaded – Upgradeable to Windows 11 Pro

PCs will come preloaded with Windows 10 Pro and will be able to upgrade to Windows 11 Pro when it becomes available for the device. The upgrade rollout plan for Windows 11 Pro is in progress and will continue into 2022.

Can I continue to use Windows 10 Pro?

Yes. You do not have to upgrade to Windows 11 Pro. Microsoft will continue to support Windows 10 Pro until October 14, 2025.

Can I switch back to Windows 10 Pro after I upgrade if I do not like Windows 11 Pro?

Yes. Once you have upgraded to Windows 11 Pro, you have 10 days to move back to Windows 10 Pro while keeping files and data that you brought along with you. After that 10-day period, you will need to back up your data and do a “clean install” to move back to Windows 10 Pro.

Power to work

The ThinkCentre M75s Gen 2 desktop will breeze through your toughest. Multitask, create content, and crunch data easily, improving productivity and the bottom line.

Steadfast security

The Thinkcentre M75s Gen 2 small form factor desktop’s discrete Trusted Platform Module (dTPM) chip encrypts critical information and enables hardware authentication. BIOS-based Smart USB Protection prevents unauthorized access via peripheral. And AMD GuardMI technology enables power-on-to-power-off data protection with a co-processor inside the AMD Ryzen PRO CPU.

Convenience guaranteed

Turn on the desktop with a simple key stroke. Connect multiple peripherals to a variety of ports, for seamless multitasking. Easily manage updates, diagnostics, and security from a remote location.

Energy-efficient and reliable

The M75s Gen 2 has a minimal footprint on the environment as well as on your desk. It meets global sustainability standards. It’s designed and rigorously tested for durability and reliability.
